title: Single Authority View Generated
description: Detailed view of a single VeChain Thor authority node performance - Generated by thorflux dashgen

options.content: Single Authority View

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "recent_slots")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "block_number")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["proposer"] == "${proposer}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["filled"] == "0")
  |> group()
  |> count()
  |> yield(name: "_value")

panels.title: Missed Slots
panels.description: Total count of missed slots for the selected proposer

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "recent_slots")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "block_number")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["proposer"] == "${proposer}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["filled"] == "1")
  |> group()
  |> count()
  |> yield(name: "_value")

panels.title: Filled Slots
panels.description: Total count of filled slots for the selected proposer

targets.query:
a = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "recent_slots")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "block_number")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["proposer"] == "${proposer}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["filled"] == "0")
  |> group()
  |> count()
      |> map(
        fn: (r) => ({
            _join: 0,
            _value_a: r._value
        }),
    )

b = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "recent_slots")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "block_number")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["proposer"] == "${proposer}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["filled"] == "1")
  |> group()
  |> count()
      |> map(
        fn: (r) => ({
            _join: 0,
            _value_b: r._value
        }),
    )

join(tables: {a: a, b: b}, on: ["_join"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_join"])
  |> map(
        fn: (r) => ({
            _value: float(v: r._value_a) / float(v: r._value_b) * 100.0
        }),
    )

panels.title: Missed/Filled slots %
panels.description: Percentage of missed slots vs filled slots for the selected proposer

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "recent_slots" and r["_field"] == "block_number" and r.filled == "1" and r.proposer == "${proposer}")
  |> limit(n: 1000)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ slot: r._value, time: r._time}))
  |> keep(columns: ["slot", "time"])

panels.title: Filled Slots
panels.description: Table showing filled slots for the selected proposer

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "recent_slots" and r["_field"] == "block_number" and r.filled == "0" and r.proposer == "${proposer}")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ slot: r._value, time: r._time}))
  |> keep(columns: ["slot", "time"])

panels.title: Missed Slots
panels.description: Table showing missed slots for the selected proposer
